title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 4-1.9 - Recordkeeping
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 4-1.9 - Recordkeeping

State Regulations

The owner of a cooling tower shall maintain records for at least three years of all sampling and analyses; disinfection schedules and applications; inspection findings, deficiencies, and corrective actions; and certifications. An owner shall maintain a copy of the maintenance program and plan required by this Subpart on the premises where a cooling tower is located. Such records and plan shall be made available to the department or local health department immediately upon request. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
4-1.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
